column4: Yeah, when I try to run compiz, is says I'm inelligible. I've got a 3D, OpenGL capable graphics card (Intel 82G965 integrated), but apparently my driver is experimental, since I initially had problems using my screen and had to use the nifty new card selector to get what I wanted out of my card.
You can enable compiz but you will not be able to view video if you do.
if you enable compiz you will not be able to watch video
but your video will stop working. If you disable effects it will work again though.
